inclusion.criterion: Parents with stable cohabiting and both of them responsible for the care of the infant
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Double or single pregnancy (monochorionic or bichorionic)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Born and hospitalized within the first 48 hours of life or with a stay of at least 48 hours at Clínica Alemana de Santiago or at Hospital San José
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Mother with antecedents or confirmed exposure to cocaine, marihuana or cocaine crack during pregnancy
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Neurological disease that impairs the infant's development confirmed at birth
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: A 5 months old male brought to the pediatrics surgery clinic with the complaint of empty scrotum at the right side. The baby boy is a first child who was born at the age of 38 weeks with NVD from a healthy mother.
